price: Kuşkusuz onlar, ahirette hüsrana uğrayanların ta kendileridir.
arabic: لَا جَرَمَ أَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: lā jarama annahum fī al-ākhirati humu al-khāsirūna
